argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_iunid | |- U_ y e. B { y } = B |
| 2 | 1 | #P_xpeq2i | |- ( A X. U_ y e. B { y } ) = ( A X. B ) |
| 3 |  | #P_xpiundi | |- ( A X. U_ y e. B { y } ) = U_ y e. B ( A X. { y } ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqtr3i | |- ( A X. B ) = U_ y e. B ( A X. { y } ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( B e. W -> B e. W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fconstmpt | |- ( A X. { y } ) = ( x e. A |-> y ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( A e. V -> ( x e. A |-> y ) e. _V ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( A e. V -> ( A X. { y } ) e. _V ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ralrimivw | |- ( A e. V -> A. y e. B ( A X. { y } ) e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_iunexg | |- ( ( B e. W /\ A. y e. B ( A X. { y } ) e. _V ) -> U_ y e. B ( A X. { y } ) e. _V ) |
| 11 | 5, 9, 10 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> U_ y e. B ( A X. { y } ) e. _V ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( A X. B ) e. _V ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ xpexg requiring Replacement ( ~ ax-rep ) but not Power Set ( ~ ax-pow ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
